summary.span: 提供來自統一資源識別元 (URI) 的回應。

span.span: Provides a response from a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).
This is an class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是`abstract`基底的類別衍生類別通訊協定特有的回應。The class is the `abstract` base class from which protocol-specific response classes are derived. 應用程式可以參與在要求和回應的交易中使用的執行個體的通訊協定無從驗證方式類別時通訊協定特定類別衍生自執行要求的詳細資料。Applications can participate in request and response transactions in a protocol-agnostic manner using instances of the class while protocol-specific classes derived from carry out the details of the request. 用戶端應用程式不會建立物件藉由呼叫的建立直接;方法執行個體。Client applications do not create objects directly; they are created by calling the method on a instance. ## Examples 下列範例會建立的執行個體。The following example creates a instance from a . [!code-cpp[Classic WebRequest Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebRequest Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebRequest Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebRequest Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebRequest Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebRequest Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 當由子系類別覆寫時，關閉回應資料流。

span.span: When overridden by a descendant class, closes the response stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法清除所使用的資源並關閉基礎資料流，藉由呼叫方法。The method cleans up the resources used by a and closes the underlying stream by calling the method. > [!NOTE] > 若要避免系統資源不足，必須先關閉回應。The response must be closed to avoid running out of system resources. 可以藉由呼叫關閉回應資料流或。The response stream can be closed by calling or . > [!NOTE] > 類別是`abstract`類別。The class is an `abstract` class. 實際行為在執行階段的執行個體取決於所傳回的子系類別。The actual behavior of instances at run time is determined by the descendant class returned by . 如需預設值和例外狀況的詳細資訊，請參閱文件子系的類別，例如和。For more information about default values and exceptions, please see the documentation for the descendant classes, such as and . ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，關閉`WebResponse`。The following example uses the method to close the `WebResponse`. [!code-cpp[WebResponse_close#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebResponse_Close/CPP/webresponse_close.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebResponse_close#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebResponse_Close/CS/webresponse_close.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebResponse_close#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebResponse_Close/VB/webresponse_close.vb#1)]

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示會同時釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源； 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

summary.span: 釋放 物件所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性處置 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the object, and optionally disposes of the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

summary.span: 取得 值，指出這個回應是否從快取中取得。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether this response was obtained from the cache.

value.span: 如果回應從快取中取得，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the response was taken from the cache; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的快取原則和快取中要求之資源的存在會決定是否可以從快取中擷取的回應。The current cache policy and the presence of the requested resource in the cache determine whether a response can be retrieved from the cache. 使用快取回的應，通常可改善應用程式效能，但會有風險，在快取的回應不符合伺服器上的回應。Using cached responses usually improves application performance, but there is a risk that the response in the cache does not match the response on the server. 使用屬性來設定和類別來列舉目前快取原則。Use the property to set and the class to enumerate the current caching policy. 請注意，取得這個屬性可以擲回。Note that getting this property can throw .
